passive.name: Plenilune Radiance
passive.description: Increases ATK by {atkPct}%. Casting Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation increases Resonance Liberation DMG by {ult}% for 15s. Obtaining Shield allows Resonance Liberation DMG to ignore {defIgnore}% of the target's DEF for 7s, stacking up to 5 times. This effect is triggered once every 0.5s. Upon casting Intro Skill, this effect reaches max stacks immediately, lasting for 3s.

passive.name: Thunderblaze Eminence
passive.description: Increases ATK by {atkPct}%. Casting Intro Skill or Resonance Skill increases Heavy Attack DMG by {haDmg}% for 15s. Obtaining Shield allows Heavy Attack DMG to ignore {defIgnore}% of the target's DEF for 7s, stacking up to 5 times (triggers once every 0.5s).

passive.name: Ad Veritatem
passive.description: Gain {allAtr}% Attribute DMG Bonus. When using Resonance Liberation, the wielder gains {ult}% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus for 8s. This effect can be extended by 5s each time Resonance Skills are cast, up to 3 times.

passive.name: Stormy Resolution
passive.description: Increases Energy Regen by {er}%. When hitting a target with Resonance Skill, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by {baDmg}%, lasting for 8s. When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by {skill}%, lasting for 8s.

passive.name: Fool's Warble
passive.description: Increases ATK by {atkPct}%. Every time Basic Attack or Intro Skill is cast, Heavy Attack DMG Bonus increases by {haDmg}% for 3s.

passive.name: Darkness Breaker
passive.description: Increases ATK by {atkPct}%. Casting Basic Attack grants the following effects: Dealing damage ignores {defIgnore}% of the target's DEF and Amplifies Spectro Frazzle DMG dealt by {frazzle}% for 6s. Retriggering the effect resets its duration.

passive.name: Stormy Resolution
passive.description: Increases Energy Regen by {er}%. When Resonance Skill is cast, Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by {ult}%, stacking up to 3 times. This effect lasts for 12s.

passive.name: Divine Blessing
passive.description: Grants {allAtr}% Attribute DMG Bonus. Casting Intro Skill gives the equipper Ageless Marking, which grants {skill}% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for 12s. Casting Resonance Skill gives the equipper Ethereal Endowment, which grants{skill}% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for 12s.

passive.name: Swordsworn
passive.description: Increases Attribute DMG Bonus by {allAtr}%. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by {haDmg}%, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.

passive.name: Blazing Starfire
passive.description: Increases ATK by {atkPct}%. Performing Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation increases Resonance Liberation DMG by {ult}% for 6s. Dealing Heavy Attack DMG extends this effect by 4s, up to 1 time. Each successful extension gives {fusion}% Fusion DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

buff.description: Each successful extension gives {fusion}% Fusion DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

passive.name: Underworld Requiem
passive.description: ATK is increased by {atkPct}%. Within 12s after dealing Echo Skill DMG, gain {skill}% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus and {echoDmgAmp}% Echo Skill DMG Amplification, and ignore {defIgnore}% of the target's DEF when dealing damage.

passive.name: Stormy Resolution
passive.description: Increases Energy Regen by {er}%. When dealing Basic Attack DMG, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by {baDmg}%, stacking up to 5 times. This effect lasts for 8s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 0.5s.

passive.name: Astral Evolvement
passive.description: Increase HP by {hpPct}%. Restore 8/10/12/14/16 Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by {atkPctTm}% for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

buff.description: When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by {atkPct}% for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

passive.name: Electric Amplification
passive.description: Grants {allAtr}% Attribute DMG Bonus. When dealing Resonance Skill DMG, increases ATK by {atkPct}%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect lasts for 5s. When the wielder is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional {additionalAtk}%

passive.name: Homebuilder's Anthem
passive.description: Increase ATK by {atkPct}%. Dealing DMG to targets with Spectro Frazzle grants the wielder {baDmg}% Basic Attack DMG Bonus and {haDmg}% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3 for 6s. Casting Outro Skill Amplifies the Spectro Frazzle DMG on targets around the active Resonator by {frazzleTm}% for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

buff.description: Casting Outro Skill Amplifies the Spectro Frazzle DMG on targets around the active Resonator by {frazzleTm}% for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

passive.name: Panorama
passive.description: Increase ATK by {atkPct}%. While the wielder is on the field, using Resonance Skill grants {baDmgStack}% Basic Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3 times for 6s. At 3 stacks or above, casting Outro Skill consumes all stacks of this effect and grants the wielder {baDmg} Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 27s, effective when the wielder is off the field.

passive.name: From the Deep
passive.description: Increases ATK by {atkPct}%. Casting Echo Skill within 10s after casting Intro Skill or Basic Attacks grants 1 of Gentle Dream. Echoes with the same name can only trigger this effect once, stacking up to 2 times, lasting for 10s. When reaching 2 stacks, casting Echo Skill no longer resets the duration of this effect. This effect activates up to once per 10s. Switching to another Resonator ends this effect early. With 1: Grants {baDmg}% Basic Attack DMG Bonus. With 2: Ignores {havocShred}% of the target's Havoc RES.

passive.name: Crimson Phoenix
passive.description: ATK increased by {atkPct}%. The wielder gains 1 stack of Searing Feather upon dealing damage, which can be triggered once every 0.5s, and gains 5 stacks of the same effect upon casting Resonance Skill. Each stack of Searing Feather gives {skill}% additional Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for up to 14 stacks. After reaching the max stacks, all stacks will be removed in 12s.

passive.name: A Free Knight's Tarantella
passive.description: Max HP is increased by {hpPct}%. 15s after casting Intro Skill or Basic Attacks, ignore {defIgnore}% of the target's DEF when dealing damage. If the target has at least 1 stack of Aero Erosion, the DMG taken by the target is Amplified by {allAmp}%.

passive.name: Harmonious Vibrancy
passive.description: Providing Healing increases Resonance Skill DMG by {skill}% for 6s. When Rover: Aero casts Resonance Skill Unbound Flow, Aero DMG dealt by nearby Resonators on the field is Amplified by {aeroAmpTm}% for 30s.

buff.description: When Rover: Aero casts Resonance Skill Unbound Flow, Aero DMG dealt by nearby Resonators on the field is Amplified by {aeroAmp}% for 30s.

passive.name: Laughter Prevails
passive.description: Increase Crit. Rate by {cr}%. Casting Resonance Liberation gives {baDmg}% Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 10s. Dealing Basic Attack DMG gives {baDmg}% Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 4s.

passive.name: Stormy Resolution
passive.description: Increases Energy Regen by {er}%. When Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by {atkPct}%, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.

passive.name: Beyond the Cycle
passive.description: Increase ATK by {atkPct}%. When dealing Basic Attack DMG, the wielder gains {baDmgStack}% Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 14s. This effect can be triggered once per second, stacking up to 3 times. When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain {baDmg}% Basic DMG Bonus for 10. This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.

passive.name: Silent Eulogy
passive.description: Increases ATK by {atkPct}%. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increases by {skill}% for 5s.

passive.name: Stormy Resolution
passive.description: Increases Energy Regen by {er}%. Incoming Resonator's ATK is increased by {atkPct}% for 14s, stackable up to 1 times after the wielder casts Outro Skill.

buff.description: Incoming Resonator's ATK is increased by {atkPct}% for 14s, stackable up to 1 times after the wielder casts Outro Skill.

passive.name: Lingering Summer Tune
passive.description: ATK is increased by {atkPct}%. Inflicting Aero Erosion on the target gives {aeroBouns}% Aero DMG Bonus for 10s. Hitting targets with Aero Erosion reduces their Aero RES by {aeroShred}% for 20s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

buff.description: Hitting targets with Aero Erosion reduces their Aero RES by {aeroShred}% for 20s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

passive.name: To Fire She Returns
passive.description: ATK is increased by {atkPct}%. Upon dealing Echo Skill DMG, gain {haDmgAmp}% Heavy Attack DMG Amplification for 6s. Upon dealing Heavy Attack DMG, gain {echoDmgAmp}% Echo Skill DMG Amplification for 6s. DMG Amplification on each attack is capped at 24%. While both effects are active, dealing damage ignores {defIgnore}% of the target's DEF.

passive.name: When A Heart Settles
passive.description: ATK is increased by {atkPct}%. Casting Echo Skill grants 1 stack of Bamboo Cleaver, which grants {haDmg}% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to the wielder. This effect can be triggered by Echoes of the same name once only, stacking up to 2 times, lasting for 30s. When Bamboo Cleaver reaches max stacks, casting Echo Skill resets its duration. Casting Intro Skill grants {echoDmgTm}% Echo Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 10s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

buff.description: Casting Intro Skill grants {echoDmg}% Echo Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 10s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
